metadata.title: CVE-2020-12413 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The Raccoon attack is a timing attack on DHE ciphersuites inherit in theTLS specification. To mitigate this vulnerability, Firefox disabled supportfor DHE ciphersuites.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12413` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.49.1-1ubuntu1.7
libnss3-tools - 2:3.49.1-1ubuntu1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:3.49.1-1ubuntu1.7').
